name: Chaos Car
description:
Your self-driving car has driven away without anyone inside! You must protect it at all costs, so you jump in your helicopter to drop bombs on everything in it's path!

Controls

A/D or Left/Right arrows - Move your helicopter
Space - Drop a bomb
Escape - Quit
M - Toggle music

Credits

Music - https://opengameart.org/content/hold-line-lospec-mix
Font - https://monkopus.itch.io/stacked-pixel

Made in less than 48 hours (more like 10) for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.
